products.title: Sony PlayStation®5
products.description: PlayStation®5 Console The PS5® console unleashes new gaming possibilities that you never anticipated. Experience lightning fast loading with an ultra-high speed SSD, deeper immersion with support for haptic feedback, adaptive triggers, and 3D Audio, and an all-new generation of incredible PlayStation® games. Lightning Speed: Harness the power of a custom CPU, GPU, and SSD with Integrated I/O that rewrite the rules of what a PlayStation® console can do. Stunning Games: Marvel at incredible graphics and experience new PS5® features. Play a back catalog of supported PS4® games. Breathtaking Immersion: Discover a deeper gaming experience with support for haptic feedback, adaptive triggers, and 3D Audio technology. Vertical stand sold separately. *PS5® console (CFI-2000 model group – slim) 23D audio via built-in TV speakers or analog/USB stereo headphones. Set up and latest system software update required. Internet connection required to pair Disc Drive and PS5® console upon setup.

products.title: Sony PlayStation®4
products.description: Unleash your gaming potential with the PlayStation®4 Console. Experience dynamic gaming and entertainment with an array of features designed to provide a seamless, immersive experience. From stunning graphics to a robust lineup of games, the PS4® console is the perfect choice for gamers seeking an engaging experience.

products.title: Canon EOS 1500D 24.1MP
products.description: Unlock boundless creativity on your journeys with Canon EOS R10. Compact design, 24.2MP clarity, swift autofocus, and 4K UHD video redefine travel and vlogging adventures, capturing every moment in vivid detail and unmatched brilliance.

products.title: Nikon Z50 Mirrorless Camera
products.description: Introducing the Z 50, a compact, lightweight, and powerful mirrorless camera. Inheriting the proud DNA of the Z series, this camera features a large inner diameter of 55mm and a short flange focal distance of 16mm – delivering incredibly vibrant images and three-dimensionality without the little imperfections. Capture spontaneous life moments with the intuitively-designed and comfortable camera body that feels like an extension of your hand. It is almost as nimble and compact in size as your passport – though not as thin! Perfect for adventurers, wanderers, foodies and café-dwellers, slip the Z 50 into your bag the next time you go exploring and share your experiences with the world.

products.title: Samsung Galaxy Tab S8+
products.description: Take your gaming to the next level with a console that redefines gaming power. The XYZ Gaming Console offers state-of-the-art graphics, lightning-fast processing, and a vast library of exclusive titles. Elevate your gaming experience with immersive gameplay, stunning visuals, and a vibrant online community.

products.title: Samsung Galaxy Tab S9
products.description: S Pen, the most powerful Samsung Galaxy tablet, and Galaxy ecosystem. Galaxy Tab S9, S9+, and S9 Ultra combine advanced screen technology, processing power, and creative tools that empower users to take their big ideas and bring them to life. Perfect for multi-tasking with the ultra large display and the easy to use multi-window feature.

products.title: Google Pixel Tablet
products.description: Google Pixel Tablet with Charging Speaker Dock, 128 GB. It features a beautiful 11-inch display that’s perfect for streaming shows and playing games. You can even control compatible smart home devices on the Pixel Tablet’s HD screen. The Charging Speaker Dock keeps your Pixel Tablet charged and delivers room-filling sound. The Pixel Tablet comes in three different colors: Porcelain, Hazel, and Rose.
